trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There was one other sighting in Montreal on or around July 27th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailslike the witness in ontario canada who took some pictures of a yellow\golden star... i also saw this star between 1h00am and 4h30am. i bring with me my father outside to look at the star, he never saw a star so bright. when i asked if we have any camera... the color of the star fade out! when you take a picture of this star, isn't the same color as when you look with your eyes. so.... this star is there every night... 1am-4am (montreal time) i contacted some local medias to get an answer and some media coverage. i invite you, if you see this star to report it on your local media. we need more media coverage about this star.
